WHY_ME.description: I am motivated to continuously learn new technologies and develop myself. My ability to solve complex problems and my passion for programming make me a valuable member of your team.

SKILLS.description: The IT landscape is continuously evolving, with new technologies and methodologies. Staying motivated to expand my IT skills requires a strategic approach, a curious mindset, and a commitment to lifelong learning.
SKILLS.new_tech: I am always happy to learn new technologies, just tell me what you need.
SKILLS.learn_new_tech: I always try to expamd my current skill set and  I am happy to learn new technologies, just tell me what else do you need.

WORK.about_description_project_1: Task Manager, inspired by the Kanban system. Create and organize tasks with drag-and-drop functionality, assign users and categories.
WORK.about_description_project_2: A jump-and-run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Pepe fight dangerous enemies and defeat the powerful final boss.

WORK.tech-description_project_3: Angular, TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Firebase
WORK.learned_description_project_1: Through my work on Join, I gained valuable experience in efficiently integrating a database with Firebase and implementing a reliable login function. Working in a team especially taught me how crucial clear communication and the targeted use of Git are for successful collaboration.
WORK.learned_description_project_2: Through my work on El Pollo Loco, I gained valuable insights into building 2D games with Canvas and further deepened my understanding of object-oriented programming. This project not only challenged my creativity but also taught me how to break down complex logic into manageable modules.
WORK.learned_description_project_3: The Pokedex project helped me develop a solid understanding of working with REST APIs. I learned how to retrieve data efficiently and present it in a user-friendly way, which significantly enhanced my skills in JavaScript and CSS.

REF.mobile_sub_title: Here what my colleagues said about me
REF.description_card_1: Working with Denis was always pleasant and enriching. At the same time, he impressed with his eagerness to learn and his determination to take on new challenges.
REF.description_card_2: Denis was a real asset to our joint project. Communication regarding project requirements was always clear, timely, and straightforward.
REF.description_card_3: His structured approach, dedication, and ability to efficiently solve even complex challenges significantly advanced the project.

CONTACT.description: Whether your project involves developing a new application, upgrading existing systems, or implementing robust cybersecurity measures, I have the technical acumen and problem-solving skills to ensure successful outcomes.
